error.message: Class Drupal\simple_ldap_sso\Form\SimpleLdapSsoSettingsForm was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.

Call to deprecated method getUsername() of class Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::getAccountName() or \Drupal\user\UserInterface::getDisplayName() instead.

Call to deprecated method getUsername() of class Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::getAccountName() or \Drupal\user\UserInterface::getDisplayName() instead.

Call to deprecated method getUsername() of class Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::getAccountName() or \Drupal\user\UserInterface::getDisplayName() instead.

Call to deprecated method getUsername() of class Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::getAccountName() or \Drupal\user\UserInterface::getDisplayName() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.

Parameter $query of method Drupal\simple_ldap_user\SimpleLdapUserManager::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Class Drupal\Tests\simple_ldap\Unit\SimpleLdapUserManagerTest was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to simple_ldap.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
